item.description:
I am excited to once again host the Human Awareness Institute presenting a mini-workshop on Relational Intimacy. For anyone who has not yet experienced their work, I highly recommend taking advantage of this free opportunity to drop into sweet connection with yourself and others in a very safe and respectful space. And if you attended previously, you are of course welcome to attend again!

Discover how your beliefs about love, intimacy and sexuality affect your relationships, sexual satisfaction, marriage, body image and ability to find love. Our personal relationship workshops are about:

· Making the right relationship choices

· Discovering greater depths of intimacy and love

· Finding love, being honest and creating intimacy

· Creating the relationships you’ve always wanted

In this free relationship mini-workshop, you’ll have the opportunity to connect with others through verbal sharing and exercises designed to open your heart. Come and get a taste of what you’ve been craving, in a totally safe, non-sexual environment. The event is free, and the people are wonderful. All that’s missing is you!

Sunday, Aug 29, 2-4:30 PM

The Human Awareness Institute (HAI) welcomes singles, couples, traditional and non-traditional relationships, without regard to sexual choices or preferences.

Please RSVP if you can so that we can plan appropriately. If you find yourself available at the last minute, come join us!

For more info about HAI visit http://hai.org/love_i...

"Brynn, I want to thank you again for introducing me to the Human Awareness Institute Workshops. After attending the mini workshop you hosted last year I felt a closed heart begin to open again (my it felt good). Since that workshop I've attended two weekend workshops and will be attending a third this April. I wholeheartedly feel these experiential workshops are some of the best I've ever participated in. Combining a new loving sense of myself, along with new wonderful friends I've made, I can say my life is richer and will never be the same." -Ben
item.name: Relational Intimacy – An Afternoon Exploration
